entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
